message.body: Hey :] how long ruj gonna be in ceramics for later today?
i'll be in from 3 to 6, ideally. normally fridays are 4 to 7 but i'm hoping to come earlier if i can.

Okay cool! :] i have work till 4 and then i have to go to the payroll office to change my direct deposit info but then ill be there, hopefully b4 5. idk if we can load my giant thing today...if not i can always come in another time and do itt
wait, is your thing firing to cone 8 or 6?
Hmmmm i dont remember...ill have to look it upp...i think cone 6...did u wanna put it in today?
i'd prefer to put it in today but we could also do it tomorrow at between 12 and 1 if that works better.
actually that might just be better...
Aha okay w.e. U want. I just left work but i have to get my check so ill be in b4 430
but is at 12 or so okay? because i'd probably prefer that since i'll be here anyway.
Cool. Im actly still gonna colme in. Have u put on the lowfire kiln yet?
there's gonna be two of them but i'mma start them both tonight
or maybe one today and one sunday... sorry, thinking out loud.
Ahaha no worries. I just still have to glaze something that i want low fired so its chill :]
